response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and the significant benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I would like to propose purchasing this product for $7,200. This represents a substantial value for you while allowing me to secure a fair return on my investment. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
